1_18SFer1zAMegr8LEtnFPWK8MnneWkYtZzr.body: Don't participate in state institutions, in other words, living in the woods isn't actually unrealistic, but rather a experience that frees yourself from the mindset of a typical capitalistic society, where the state does everything in order to obtain control by using the same economic system mentioned. What i suggest is to try to be self-reliant, don't participate in consumerism, and don't guide yourself through TV or what. I Suggest a good look on Anarchism and Free Software.
